titles.title: A resolution concerning the dual banking system.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Financial Institutions Supervision, Regulation and Insurance.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

committee.subcommittee: Financial Institutions Supervision, Regulation and Insurance
committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 3/16/1988--Introduced. Declares that the House of Representatives: (1) supports the authority of States to determine and to regulate the activities of State-chartered banks consistent with the Federal and State interest in the safety and soundness of the banking system; and (2) pledges to preserve and strengthen the dual banking system.
